item.title: Divers found dead, one in the jaws of a shark, near popular scuba spot
item.description: Two Russian tourists died while scuba diving, with one believed to have drowned and the other attacked by sharks, officials said.

item.title: Boris Spassky, who lost famed chess match to Bobby Fischer, dies at 88
item.description: Boris Spassky is best remembered for his duel with American Bobby Fischer in a legendary 1972 match that became a proxy for Cold War rivalries.

item.title: 25 arrested in global operation targeting AI child sexual abuse content
item.description: Law enforcement agencies from Australia to Canada helped detain dozens of suspects linked to a Denmark-based AI child sex abuse platform, Europol says...

item.title: State Dept. trying to evade refugee admissions court order, aid groups say
item.description: Refugee aid groups say the Trump administration seems to be trying to circumvent a court ruling blocking his efforts to suspend the nation's refugee a...

item.title: Rose Girone, thought to be the oldest living Holocaust survivor, dies at 113
item.description: Rose Girone, believed to be the oldest living Holocaust survivor and a strong advocate for sharing survivors' stories, has died. She was 113.
